Introduction

Allen is a Taiwanese-American rapper under Starship Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group CRAVITY.

He joined JYP in 2016 and left in 2018. He was supposed to participate in “Stray Kids Survival Show” but was replaced before the first episode.

He debuted as a member of CRAVITY on April 14, 2020 with the mini album "HIDEOUT : REMEMBER WHO WE ARE".

Fun facts

1
Allen is good friends with all the Stray Kids members.
…
2
Allen is Chinese, but he was raised in Los Angeles, California, USA.
…
3
Allen was supposed to debut in Stray Kids, but in the end, he did not make it to the lineup. Lee Know replaced him.
…
4
Allen and Lee Chae Yeon are friends.
…
5
One of Allen's strengths is that he can speak in different languages to communicate with friends from different countries.
…
6
When Allen was in his first year of middle school, he did a dance cover of SHINee's "Lucifer" which inspired him to become a Kpop idol.
…
